content:
Plugins After Install Chrome as the Browser, there are some step for plugins.
Go to Chrome web store and search:
 Android Emulator Emulate Android App Grammarly Fix grammar problems AdGuard Block ads when watching movies  Bookmarks There are many useful online tools’ websites. Add them in the bookmarks:
Program  Web Server 000webhost provides 1 GB free space for server. Just put index.html in the folder public_html Host Domain TK offers free host name for 1 year. It includes .tk .ml .ga .cf .gq Picture Source A.Photo Store pictures for using in websites  Academic  Online Latex Overleaf Write the thesis online Online Draw Draw Graph for UML, Entity Relation, etc.  Amusement  MP3 Convert Flvto Convert Youtube video into MP3, then Downloads Free

title: Github User Behaviour Analystics

content:
Overview Update website Using Hugo to set personal website has some issues about Git to attention. Source code and website code are independent.
   Category Source code Website Code     Creation Manually Automatically   File type .md .html   Usage Edit the Content Display the Information   Folder hugo root public    Therefore, we need to develop the source code firstly, and push it to git. Then, refresh the public folder to update the blog website. The steps are as follows.
 Git push Blog source Create public folder Operate the following commands:  cd public git clone https://github.com/:github_account/:git_repository cd .. hugo server cd public git add . git commit -m 'update blog' git push
summary:
Overview Update website Using Hugo to set personal website has some issues about Git to attention. Source code and website code are independent.
   Category Source code Website Code     Creation Manually Automatically   File type .md .html   Usage Edit the Content Display the Information   Folder hugo root public    Therefore, we need to develop the source code firstly, and push it to git.
title: Git Commands in Usage

content: Create the dynamic picture  导入图片 File -> 设置图片大小（宽500px） 打开时间轴控件 逆向并设置时间 设置过度（每张1秒，间隔20张） 存储为网页可识别

title: Photoshop Tips

content:
After Install Atom as the Editor, there are some tips.
Hot Key The list is shown in File -> Settings -> Keybindings. Some of them are used frequently.
 Ctrl-Shift-F Find in the whole project Ctrl-Shift-M Preview Ctrl-Comma Settings  Plugins There are some necessary plugins which can help write the code. Instal them accross File -> Settings
 Preview Go to Packages and disable mark-preview, then, go to Install and search mark-preview-plus Tool-Bar Search it by tool-bar-markdown-writer, it will need the dependency, include tool-bar and markdown-writer, the system will promt. Language Search it by language-markdown
summary:
After Install Atom as the Editor, there are some tips.
Hot Key The list is shown in File -> Settings -> Keybindings. Some of them are used frequently.

 Preview Go to Packages and disable mark-preview, then, go to Install and search mark-preview-plus Tool-Bar Search it by tool-bar-markdown-writer, it will need the dependency, include tool-bar and markdown-writer, the system will promt.
